entry.title: Launch Site to multiple PCs using PowerShell

link.title: Launch Site to multiple PCs using PowerShell

entry.content:
Using a combination of PsExec and PowerShell, I created a script to launch mutiple browsers on different laptops. This was a short project I did for a computer lab teacher in my children’s elementary school.

The script uses 3 main components to achieve this:

  • Which can be downloaded here.
  • PowerShell
  • Text file with list of PCs

Lets get to the good stuff:
entry.summary: Using a combination of PsExec and PowerShell, I created a script to launch mutiple browsers on different laptops. This was a short project I did for a computer lab teacher in my children’s elementary school.
